document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: RE: Limiting instructions letter 
Date: Sat, 20 Nov 2021 17:44:29 +0000 
Attachments: 2021-11-20,_GM,_ediLs_to_limiting_instructions_v2.docx 
Hi team, 
After some editing, here's a draft response as a starting point. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Saturday, November 20, 2021 12:04 PM 
To: 
c.   >; 
<1.>; 
Subject: Limiting instructions letter 
Hey team, 
Per the attached order on MV-3, we owe Judge Nathan our views on the proposed limiting instructions. Can we add this 
to the list for our call? I've written two responsive letters because I'm not sure exactly what she's going for with the 
second instruction. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 Saint Andrews Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00024905
